name: sample
content: '(1,\'Clock Pendants\',\'PRODUCT\',60.30,\'This lovely collection of clock pedants, are a convenient and stylish way to keep track of time! Choose between four fabulous lockets: \\r\\nThe Love Locket is a Lock pendant with the word LOVE on the front and a key dangling beneath it! The front flips open and reveals a clock on the inside.\\r\\n-The Owl Clock/ Locket has a charming owl on the front, and lovely flowers and designs carved on the back. The front clicks open to reveal a little clock inside.\\r\\n-The Clock Sphere is a round glass clock that show the inside gadgets through the back.')'
